title: New: Washed Out – Don't Give Up
body:
Lyric videos.

Ugh. Anyway, **Washed Out**, we forgive you. Still refusing to drop the Hipster Runoff coined genre chillwave, new track _Don’t Give Up_ doesn’t sway too far from the sound that brought him his initial success, yet drops any bedroom-produced connotations. This is bolder, more openly anthemic, sampling the sound of a bustling crowd, alongside his trademark tribal beats and reverb heavy vocals. Check out _Don’t Give Up_ below, taken from his new record**_ Paracosm_** out August 2013 on SubPop.
